```{r}

#1. Using the for loop, create an R script that will display a 5x5 matrix

vectorA <- c(1,2,3,4,5)
matrixA <- matrix(0,nrow =5, ncol =5)

for (i in 1:5)
  for (j in 1:5)
{
  matrixA[i,j] <- abs (vectorA[i] - vectorA[j])
}
  matrixA
  


```
#2.Print the string "*" using for() function.
```{r}

for(i in 1:5)
  cat(paste0("\"",rep("*",i), "\""), "\n")



```
